Steps.Message: Start your criminal career today! Make some ~g~cash~s~, ~b~XP ~s~and ~y~level up ~s~by exporting or scrapping wanted cars.
If you think you're bold, buy a gun at Ammu Nation, head to a store and ~o~rob it~s~. You can also do it with the help of your ~g~friends~s~.

When you commit crimes, your ~o~wanted level ~s~goes up. ~b~Cops ~s~will try to ~o~arrest ~s~you or even ~r~kill ~s~you if you turn violent. If you get arrested, you'll respawn at a ~b~police station ~s~and pay your bail.
When you ~r~die~s~, you'll respawn at a ~p~hospital ~s~and pay medical fees, and optionally a bail if you were previously wanted.
Player names and blips have different ~y~colors~s~, depending on their wanted level, from white (innocent) to orange and red (criminals). Blue names are ~b~cops~s~, purple are ~p~paramedics~s~.
You can kill the ~r~most wanted ~s~players (red name) for cash: they have a bounty on their head due to their excessive violent crimes.

~r~Important! ~s~This is not a ~r~deathmatch or PvP server~s~. Attacking and killing players is only allowed under certain conditions. Do not attack players ~r~randomly ~s~or it will result in ~r~penalties ~s~on your account. Please, read the rules at ~b~gtacnr.net/rules
Welcome back to Los Santos, ~y~@PlayerName~s~ Get out of the airport and get started.
